titleStmt.title: The humble address and recognition of the University of Oxford presented to His Sacred Majesty James II, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. according to an Act of convocation, bearing date, Feb. 21, in the year 1685.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: all but t.p. and 2 pages of text are lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
